By Subster on Tuesday, January 26, 2010 - 09:26 am:

By Rahu on Tuesday, January 26, 2010 - 10:32 am:

My very first monster was a pure Jell. Man, I miss Jells.

By Penguin God on Tuesday, January 26, 2010 - 01:14 pm:

Old Jells were awesome! I don't know what happened to them in 3...well they got cute like all the others. They were pretty cool in 4 again, but they barely had any subbreeds so they became boring.

I have plenty of "fun" memories of Capella using it's dice attack and squishing my monsters into injuries...in fact it happened last night with my Shell Saurian.

By Rahu on Tuesday, January 26, 2010 - 06:20 pm:

One of my first monsters to make it to S rank in MR 2 was a Jell/Tiger. It was through more sheer dogged determination than anything. Back then I had never heard of this site and was still trying to play MR2 like it was MR1, so it was agonizingly difficult, lol.

Anyway, I remember how awesome it was when he would turn into a helicopter and fly around the ranch. Imagine my joy when he learned how to do that in combat! That's the kind of thing that made Jells great. They'd turn into something utterly absurd, like a big can of bug spray, or a helicopter complete with launching missiles.

I hope to see more things like that in the future.

By Penguin God on Wednesday, January 27, 2010 - 06:56 am:

I forgot about the big can of bug spray! XD
